title: Spicy Tuna Patties
directions: Drain two 5-ounce cans of tuna and place in a medium bowl. Add almond flour, egg, diced jalapeno, minced garlic, red pepper flakes, sea salt, and pepper. Use a fork to mix to all up. Form into 4 patties.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil is hot, add patties and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side. The patties should be crispy on the outside and cooked through.
ingredients: 1 tsp. red pepper flakes, crushed, organic
sea salt, unrefined, & fresh ground pepper, organic to taste
2 tsp. coconut oil, raw, extra-virgin, organic
